descriptions: Student demonstrates no awareness of the school layout.
Student shows minimal awareness of the school's layout, knowing only a few key locations.
Student identifies some locations within the school but struggles to navigate or describe their relationships.
Student demonstrates a general understanding of the school's layout, able to locate most common areas.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the school's layout and is able to describe the location of all areas within the school.
Student demonstrates an expert level of knowledge of the school's layout, able to navigate the school efficiently, describe relationships between locations, and give directions to others.
Student is unaware of the areas surrounding the school.
Student recognizes some of the areas immediately adjacent to the school.
Student identifies a few key landmarks near the school but lacks a broader understanding of the environs.
Student demonstrates a general understanding of the school's surroundings, identifying major roads and nearby buildings.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the school's environs, describing the surrounding neighborhood and its key features.
Student demonstrates an expert level of knowledge of the school's environs, able to discuss the history, geography, and significance of the area surrounding the school.
Student is unaware of the jobs people do at the school.
Student recognizes the roles of a few prominent staff members (e.g., teachers, principal).
Student identifies the roles of some staff members but has limited understanding of their responsibilities.
Student demonstrates a general understanding of the jobs performed by various staff members at the school.
Student demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the roles of staff members and how they contribute to the school community.
Student demonstrates an expert level of awareness of staff roles, able to discuss the importance of each role and how they contribute to the functioning of the school.
